title: Chameleon’s Contest feat. Jonica Booth & Jay Pharoah
dc:creator: WBUR
description: Jonica Booth (Rap Stuff) and Jay Pharoah (Out of Office, Saturday Night Live) co-star in this West African tale about a clothing-obsessed goddess and a crafty, colorful chameleon.
itunes:author: WBUR
